title: Disambiguating Overlapping Traits
description: In this lab, the issue of disambiguating overlapping traits is discussed, where two traits have methods with the same name and potentially different return types.

meta.title: Disambiguating Overlapping Traits in Rust
meta.description: Explore how to handle methods with the same name and different return types in Rust traits.
meta.keywords: rust playground, programming tutorial, overlapping methods, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust commands, traits, rust practice, disambiguation, rust online

i18n.title: 消除重叠特征的歧义
i18n.description: 在本实验中，将讨论消除重叠特征歧义的问题，即两个特征具有同名方法且返回类型可能不同。
